p.3: Algorithmic Trading firm is hiring technologists from any OOP into their talented and highly collaborative tech department. You will be working to build robust, fully-automated technology to analyze data, build models, and generate alpha signals to trade on all electronic financial markets.
p.6: Automation is central to all aspects of the firm =E2=80=93 you will be working on highly optimized workflows on their dedicated CPU and GPU grids allowing our teams to solve complex trading problems, including predicting market movements and processing large data sets in real-time. Here technology doesn=E2=80=99t =E2=80=9Csupport the business=E2=80=9D - tech is core to the business and sits front and center of what they do.

li: Designing and implementing extremely high-performance, highly reliable, and finely-tuned numeric computational programs.
li.1: Contributing to the design and development of high-performance, distributed systems that enable multi-petabyte data processing.
li.2: Improving system component performance by refining the underlying algorithms, methods of processing, and identifying systems bottlenecks.
li.3: Utilizing modern statistical and machine learning methods to develop systematic trading models/algos.

li.1: CompSci or STEM degree from Top University

u: We encourage you to apply even if you think you may not currently fit all these requirements =E2=80=93 so long as you are willing to work hard and learn, we want to hear from you.
